chapters.title: Chapter 49: Court of the Sun
chapters.info: Tamaar, p. 725—Last of the five remaining members of the Concil of 22 to arrive at the meeting. Ladalin and Mora are the only remaining Wise Ones there. He looks as old as Ladalin feels. His face is scarred, and his left eye is missing. He has always been blunt. He was a friend of Ladalin's husband, who died a year ago. Tamaar's scouts brought word that the White Tower had fallen. Ladalin muses that she would have laid a bridal wreath at his feet, had times been different. See also Ladalin; Takai.
